title: On Rana Kapoor’s M F Husain painting comment, Congress get backs with ‘political vendetta’, ‘fear psychosis’ argument - The Indian Express
content:
1. On Rana Kapoor’s M F Husain painting comment, Congress get backs with ‘political vendetta’, ‘fear psychosis’ argument  The Indian Express
  2. Yes Bank Ex-Chairperson Rana Kapoor's Big Allegation | Priyanka Gandhi Latest News | CNN News18  CNN-News18
  3. Was Forced To Buy Rs 2 Crore Painting from Gandhis: Yes Bank's Rana Kapoor  NDTV
  4. Was Forced To Buy MF Husain Painting From Priyanka Gandhi: Yes Bank Co-Founder Rana Kapoor  India Today
  5. Political Vendetta: Congress on Enforcement Directorate charge sheet mentioning its leaders  The New Indian Express
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Rana’s statement is part of the chargesheet filed by the central agency in a special court in Mumbai. The Congress party did not deny the transaction between Rana and Priyanka Gandhi but argued it happened 12 years ago.
